name: .DLIS File Extension
summary: Learn about .DLIS files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a DLIS file with PPDM Data Model. PPDM stands for Professional Petroleum Data Management, which is an association that creates baseline definitions and practices around Exploration & Production (E&P) data management.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
